title: SFX VAULT SERIES PACK 1
description: 500+ Pro SFX for Game Devs - SFX Vault Series Pack 1: Diverse, High-Quality Game Audio!
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE


SFX Vault Series Pack 1: The Essential Audio Toolkit for Game Developers 


Unlock the full potential of your game’s audio with SFX Vault Series Pack 1, featuring an expansive collection of over 500 high-quality sound effects. Designed specifically for game developers, this pack provides a diverse range of sounds to bring your gaming world to life.


What’s Inside:


A collections of Single Tones (OneShots), Risers, Downers, Sweeps, Horror, Sci-fi, various noises, few loopable sounds, comic, whooshes, swooshes, and many other UI and experimental sounds.


Perfect For:


Indie and AAA Game Titles

Mobile and Console Games

Virtual Reality Experiences

Casual Gaming

Elevate your game’s auditory experience with SFX Vault Series Pack 1 and captivate your audience with professional-grade sound effects!
technicalDetails:
Features:

FILE LIST PDF

Following characteristcs and types of sound effects are included:-

 -Single Tone (Oneshots) SFX

-Risers

-Downers/Drops/Falls

-Sweeps

-Few Loopable Sounds

-Bells

-Swish, Swoosh, Whoosh

-Error Sounds

-Buzz Sounds

-Computer Communication and Related Sounds

-Horror Sounds

-Sci-fI Related Sounds

-Classic/Retro Game Sounds

-Melodic Sounds

-Pitch up/bend characteristic sounds

-Funny/Comic Sounds

-Glitches

-Clicks and popup related sounds

-Noises

-Wobbling Sounds

-Laser-style sounds

-Horns

-Pulsing Sonunds

-Strange/Experimental Sounds

-Creature Synth Sounds

-Alienetic Sounds

-etc.

Number of Audio Waves: 505

Number of Audio Cues: 505

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 KHz/16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: Mix of both

Minutes of audio provided: 40:54

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

releaseInfo.releaseNote: Silences at the beginning of each file is removed. Rest everything is same.
